# Enrage Animal (Spell)
## Overview
[[Enchantment Spells|Enchantment]] ([[Compulsion Spells|compulsion]]) \[[[Mind-Affecting Spells|mind-affecting]]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Druid Spells|Druid 1]], [[1st Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 2nd-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 2]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)

**Target:** One animal

**Duration:** Concentration +1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 82

*You feel inexplicably angry as you near the conclusion of the spell’s casting. The feeling subsides slightly as you release the spell into your target.*

*Enrage animal* affects only creatures of the animal type and bestows a +4 morale bonus to Strength and Constitution, a +2 morale bonus on Will saves, and a –2 penalty to Armor Class. This effect is otherwise identical to a barbarian’s rage, except that the animal is not fatigued at the end of the rage.
